naslov: Okrug Donji, LUKSUZNA VILLA S PANORAMSKIM POGLEDOM / čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Kao dio naše ponude, ova kuća nudi višu razinu luksuza, koji se može očitovati u primjerice, prostranosti, komforu, dizajnu i stilu, arhitekturi, dodatnim sadržajima ili mogućnostima. U prirodnom okruženju, u malom i mirnom mjestu, nedaleko od kristalno čistog mora, smještena je ova prekrasna i moderna kuća, udaljena svega 80 metara od šljunčane plaže. Sa prostranih terasa pruža se predivan panoramski pogled na more. Dok uživate u plivanju u bazenu doživljaj će Vam upotpuniti stapanje linija površine bazena s morskim plavetnilom te jedinstven pogled na more i otoke. Na parceli je i roštilj na kojem možete pripremati dalmatinske delicije sa žara. .................................................................... TEHNNIČKI OPIS: - gradnja 2018.godine - 252m2 stambeno na okućnici od 552m2 - tri etaže ( 5 soba sa kupatilima, jacuzzi, sauna, terase, roštilj... ) - grijanji bazen 33m2 - 5 parking mjesta NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i opis na ozbiljan upit eng................. - exclusive property of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. As part of our offer, this house offers a higher level of luxury, which can be manifested in, for example, spaciousness, comfort, design and style, architecture, additional facilities or options. This beautiful and modern house is located in a natural environment, in a small and quiet place, not far from the crystal clear sea, only 80 meters from the pebble beach. The spacious terraces offer a wonderful panoramic view of the sea. While you enjoy swimming in the pool, the experience will be completed by the merging of the lines of the pool's surface with the blue of the sea and a unique view of the sea and the islands. There is also a barbecue on the plot where you can prepare grilled Dalmatian delicacies. ................................................... .................. TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION: - construction in 2018 - 252m2 residential on a plot of 552m2 - three floors (5 rooms with bathrooms, jacuzzi, sauna, terraces, grill...) - heated pool 33m2 - 5 parking spaces NOTE: detailed pictures and description on serious inquiry #adriaINgroup realestate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
